Uses of Class
Statistics

    • Uses of Statistics in <Unnamed>

      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Statistics 
      Constructor and Description
      AddMenu(ProblemDatabase problem, Statistics statistics)
      The constructor, which makes visible the frame and adds the buttons and text fields
      MainMenu(ProblemDatabase problem, Statistics statistics)
      Constructs the MainMenu Object, with five buttons that lead to all five functionalities.
      QQMenu(ProblemDatabase problem, int type, Statistics statistics)
      Constructs the QQMenu; takes in the problemDatabase, Statistics, and type of problem, and calls updateProblem based on these parameters.
      RemoveMenu(ProblemDatabase problem, Statistics statistics)
      The constructor, which makes visible the frame and adds the buttons and text fields
      StartMenu(Statistics statistics)
      The constructor, which makes visible the frame and adds the enter button and the single text field for the pathname of the folder in which the program is located.
      StatsMenu(ProblemDatabase prob, Statistics statistics)
      This constructs a StatsMenu.
      TrainMenu(ProblemDatabase problem, Statistics statistics)
      Constructs the TrainMenu object; creates the problem image, timer, back button, and buttons to select the answers.
      TypeMenu(ProblemDatabase problem, Statistics statistics)
      Constructs the window for TypeMenu.
